items.title: Culture Communication: An Equation, A Word, A Measurement?
items.description: Setting the cultural direction is a critical skill for a CEO. But how do you set that direction?

items.title: Court Rejects UK Attempt To Have Apple Encryption Case Held In Secret
items.description: A U.K. court has ruled that the Home Office can't, as it had hoped, keep a hearing on backdoor access to Apple's encrypted cloud data under wraps.

items.title: Hire AI, Not Humans: Shopify CEO's Radical Mandate Catching VC Attention
items.description: "Reflexive AI usage is now a baseline expectation at Shopify," Lutke declared in his memo to employees.
